CheatEntry.Description: "<< Select a process to open and check the box."
CheatEntry.AssemblerScript:
{$lua} if syntaxcheck then return end
local Ready, gName = {}, "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream"
function Ready.enable(gameName) local msg = "<< Select a process to open and check the box." if not process then memrec.description = msg; error() end AddressList[gameName].active = true memrec.description, memrec.color = '>> '..gameName, 0x0064C8 end
function Ready.disable(gameName) Ready.removeStructures() AddressList.rebuildDescriptionCache() for i = 0, AddressList.count do if AddressList[i] then AddressList[i].active = false end end memrec.description, memrec.color = '<< Initialize table settings.', 0x0000C8 end
function Ready.removeStructures() if (getStructureCount() == 0) then return end for i = getStructureCount() - 1, 0, -1 do local st = getStructure(i) if st then st.removeFromGlobalStructureList() end end end
[ENABLE]
Ready.enable(gName)
[DISABLE]
Ready.disable(gName)

{$lua} if syntaxcheck then return end
local compactMode = function(state) local state, mf = not state, getMainForm() mf.Splitter1.Visible, mf.Panel5.Visible = state, state end
[ENABLE]
compactMode(true)
[DISABLE]
compactMode(false)

[ENABLE]
alloc(newmem,$1000,read_x_coord) label(code_x_coord,code_y_coord,move_multiplier) registersymbol(code_x_coord,code_y_coord,move_multiplier)
newmem: code_x_coord: readmem(read_x_coord,5) cmp [playerMovement_ptr],rbx jne return1 mulss xmm0,[move_multiplier] jmp return1 align 10 CC
code_y_coord: readmem(read_y_coord,5) cmp [playerMovement_ptr],rbx jne return2 mulss xmm2,[move_multiplier] jmp return2 align 10 CC
move_multiplier: dd (float)1.5
read_x_coord: jmp code_x_coord return1:
read_y_coord: jmp code_y_coord return2:
[DISABLE]
read_x_coord: readmem(code_x_coord,5)
read_y_coord: readmem(code_y_coord,5)
unregistersymbol(*) dealloc(*)

[ENABLE]
alloc(newmem,$1000,write_after_btl) label(code_after_btl,undo_after_btl) registersymbol(code_after_btl,undo_after_btl)
newmem: code_after_btl: mov r8d,7FFFFFFF
undo_after_btl: readmem(write_after_btl,5) jmp return
write_after_btl: jmp code_after_btl return:
[DISABLE]
write_after_btl: readmem(undo_after_btl,5)
unregistersymbol(*) dealloc(*)

damage_multiplier: dd (float)10.0
trace_damage: jmp code_damage nop 2 return:
[DISABLE]

unregistersymbol(*) dealloc(*)

CheatEntry.Description: "Notes: It depends on the availability of materials and the storyline."
"This script could cause the game to crash in some story events."
"It is not recommended to leave this script active at all times."

CheatEntry.AssemblerScript:
[ENABLE]
func_decAP: ret
[DISABLE]
func_decAP: db 83

{$lua} if not getAddress("item_data_ptr") or syntaxcheck then return end
local timer = createTimer()
local changeAllItemQuality = function(timer) if not memrec.active then return timer.destroy() end if readPointer("item_data_ptr") == 0 then return end local quality = readPointer("item_data_ptr") + 0x6 writeSmallInteger(quality, readSmallInteger("item_quality")) end
[ENABLE]
timer.OnTimer, timer.Interval = changeAllItemQuality, 100
[DISABLE]

[ENABLE]
luacall(getAddress("item_data_ptr"))
[DISABLE]

{$lua} if syntaxcheck then return end
local base = { {"game_set_addr", "read_game_set", 0x3}, {"time_addr", "read_time", 0x3}, {"basket_cap_addr", "read_basket_cap", 0x2}, {"cole_addr", "read_cole", 0x2}, {"quest_rep_addr", "read_quest_rep", 0x2}, {"photo_in_addr", "read_photo_in", 0x4}, {"photo_out_addr", "read_photo_out", 0x4}, {"photo_pitch_addr", "read_photo_pitch", 0x4}, }
local Find = {}
function Find.baseAddress(addrSymbol, funcSymbol, argOffset) local funcAddr = getAddressSafe(funcSymbol) if not funcAddr then return end local baseAddr = (funcAddr + argOffset + 0x4) + readInteger(funcAddr + argOffset) unregisterSymbol(addrSymbol); registerSymbol(addrSymbol, baseAddr) end
function Find.multiRegister(args) for i = 1, #args do local array = args[i]; Find.baseAddress(array[1], array[2], array[3]) end end
function Find.multiUnregister(args) for i = 1, #args do local array = args[i]; unregisterSymbol(array[1]) end end
[ENABLE]
Find.multiRegister(base)
[DISABLE]
Find.multiUnregister(base)

CheatTable.LuaScript:
local reqCE, pName = 7.2, 'ElixirFramework'
local validate = function(requireVersion, wndOrProcName) local ver = getCEVersion() local msg = 'You using Cheat Engine '..ver..'.\nRequired that you use Cheat Engine '..requireVersion..' or later.' if (ver < requireVersion) then return messageDialog(msg, 2, 2) end AddressList[0].description = "<< Initialize table settings." local id = getWindowProcessID(findWindow(utf8ToAnsi(wndOrProcName), nil)) openProcess(id); AddressList[0].active = true end
local publicMemrecCount = function() local ac, cc = AddressList.count - 1, 0 for i = ac, 0, -1 do if (AddressList[i] == AddressList["<settings>"]) then cc = i; break end end return cc end
local autoCompactMode = function() if not process or (publicMemrecCount() < 32) then return end AddressList["Cheat Engine: Compact Mode"].active = true end
validate(reqCE, pName); autoCompactMode()
